name: Young Sheldon
plot: The early life of child genius Sheldon Cooper, later seen in The Big Bang Theory.

episodes.plot: 9-year-old Sheldon Cooper is a once-in-a-generation mind capable of advanced mathematics and science but learns that isn’t always helpful growing up in East Texas, a land where church and football are king.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.plot: To appease his worried mother, Sheldon employs the techniques of a self-help book to try and make a friend.
episodes.title: Rockets, Communists, and the Dewey Decimal System

episodes.plot: When George Sr. is rushed to the emergency room, Meemaw comes to babysit, and the kids have an adventure getting to the hospital on their own.
episodes.title: Poker, Faith, and Eggs

episodes.plot: After choking on a breakfast sausage, Sheldon wrestles with his fear of solid foods and discovers comic books for the first time.
episodes.title: A Therapist, a Comic Book, and a Breakfast Sausage

episodes.plot: Sheldon struggles with newfound popularity after utilizing statistics to help the football team.
episodes.title: A Solar Calculator, a Game Ball, and a Cheerleader's Bosom

episodes.plot: When a NASA representative visits Sheldon’s school and dismisses his science, Sheldon is set on a mission to prove him wrong.
episodes.title: A Patch, a Modem, and a Zantac®

episodes.plot: The kids brainstorm ways to resolve a family feud when Meemaw refuses to give George Sr. her brisket recipe.
episodes.title: A Brisket, Voodoo, and Cannonball Run

episodes.plot: While Mary, Memaw and Missy have their girls night at the salon, the three Cooper men plan their road trip to see the space launcher, but it doesn't go as well as they plan.
episodes.title: Cape Canaveral, Schrodinger's Cat and Cyndi Lauper's Hair

episodes.plot: George Sr. strikes a deal with Sheldon to tutor Georgie when poor grades threaten to keep him from playing football
episodes.title: Spock, Kirk, and Testicular Hernia

episodes.plot: When Sheldon moves to Dallas to attend a school for gifted children, the family struggles to cope with his absence.
episodes.title: An Eagle Feather, A String Bean, And An Eskimo

episodes.plot: A worried Mary sends Sheldon to Sunday school after she finds him playing Dungeons and Dragons with his friends, Tam and Billy.
episodes.title: Demons, Sunday School, and Prime Numbers

episodes.plot: Sheldon asks for a computer and unknowingly sparks a heated argument between Mary and George Sr. over the family’s finances.
episodes.title: A Computer, a Plastic Pony, and a Case of Beer

episodes.plot: When flu season hits Medford, Sheldon takes extreme measures to remain healthy.
episodes.title: A Sneeze, Detention, and Sissy Spacek

episodes.plot: When Mary takes a job as church secretary, she finds herself becoming Pastor Jeff's marriage counselor. Also, Sheldon and Missy spend their first afternoon home alone.
episodes.title: Potato Salad, a Broomstick, and Dad's Whiskey

episodes.plot: Sheldon makes friends with an upperclassman who introduces him to a new field of science. Also, Mary and George disagree on how to handle Sheldon's blossoming social life.
episodes.title: Dolomite, Apple Slices, and a Mystery Woman

episodes.plot: A disappointing loss at the science fair sends Sheldon’s life in a new direction.
episodes.title: Killer Asteroids, Oklahoma, and a Frizzy Hair Machine

episodes.plot: Sheldon is bullied by an unlikely character, and Mary and George disagree on how to handle the situation.
episodes.title: Jiu-Jitsu, Bubble Wrap, and Yoo-hoo

episodes.plot: Mary bans Sheldon from reading a mature comic book. Sheldon decides it's time to stop living under Mary's thumb.
episodes.title: A Mother, A Child, and a Blue Man's Backside

episodes.plot: When Sheldon is no longer academically challenged at Medford High, he audits a college class taught by Dr. John Sturgis.
episodes.title: Gluons, Guacamole, and the Color Purple

episodes.plot: A battle erupts between the Coopers and Sparks when the Sparks' new dog terrorizes Sheldon.
episodes.title: A Dog, a Squirrel, and a Fish Named Fish

episodes.plot: While Sheldon is busy keeping tabs on Meemaw’s budding relationship with Dr. Sturgis, George Sr. and Mary attempt to bond with their other children.
episodes.title: Summer Sausage, a Pocket Poncho, and Tony Danza

episodes.plot: When Meemaw is pursued by two gentlemen callers, Sheldon interferes, forcing her to set some ground rules.
episodes.title: Vanilla Ice Cream, Gentleman Callers, and A Dinette Set

episodes.plot: After Sheldon dismantles the refrigerator to stop an annoying hum, he gets a paper route to pay for the repairs.
episodes.title: A High-Pitched Buzz and Training Wheels

episodes.plot: When Dr. Sturgis bonds with Paige, another 10-year-old genius, Sheldon’s jealousy leads Meemaw to intervene. Mary invites Paige’s family over for a play date.
episodes.title: A Rival Prodigy and Sir Isaac Neutron

episodes.plot: When Mary’s faith is shaken by a tragedy in the community, Sheldon becomes an unlikely ally.
episodes.title: A Crisis of Faith and Octopus Aliens

episodes.plot: When George Sr. asks Sheldon to keep a secret from Mary, the stress of not being honest drives Sheldon to hideout at Tam’s for his first sleepover.
episodes.title: A Financial Secret and Fish Sauce

episodes.plot: When Dr. Sturgis recommends Sheldon and Missy for a university research study on twins, Mary is unhappy when the test results go to Sheldon's head.
episodes.title: A Research Study and Czechoslovakian Wedding Pastries

episodes.plot: Mary clashes with Sheldon's drama teacher over plans for a Halloween fundraiser for the church. Georgie falls for a rebellious teenage girl whom Sheldon is tutoring.
episodes.title: Seven Deadly Sins and a Small Carl Sagan

episodes.plot: Sheldon gets into trouble with fellow child genius, Paige at the science museum. George Sr. is forced to play therapist to Paige’s bickering parents. Mary, Georgie and Missy help Meemaw with a garage sale.
episodes.title: Carbon Dating and a Stuffed Raccoon

episodes.plot: A video game takes over Sheldon and Meemaw’s life. George Sr. is jealous when Georgie bonds with Herschel at the auto shop.
episodes.title: An 8-Bit Princess and a Flat Tire Genius

episodes.plot: Sheldon studies his family for a psychology project. Thanksgiving dinner turns into a family fight when George Sr. is offered a job in Oklahoma.
episodes.title: Family Dynamics and a Red Fiero

episodes.plot: When Sheldon learns that people with stunted childhoods can turn into social outcasts, he tries to act. Meemaw and Dr. Sturgis' relationship is tested when she teaches him how to drive.
episodes.title: A Stunted Childhood and a Can of Fancy Mixed Nuts

episodes.plot: Sheldon experiments on Missy, and Georgie joins Mary’s bible study to spend more time with his crush, Veronica.
episodes.title: A Race of Superhumans and a Letter to Alf

episodes.plot: When Sheldon has to spend a few days in the hospital, he turns into the world’s worst patient. Also, Missy gets a taste of what life would be like without her twin.
episodes.title: A Tummy Ache and a Whale of a Metaphor

episodes.plot: Sheldon attempts to build a nuclear reactor. Also, a university cocktail party gets heated when Dr. Sturgis’ colleague, Dr. Linkletter, flirts with Meemaw, and Georgie is heartbroken when he learns Veronica has a boyfriend.
episodes.title: A Nuclear Reactor and a Boy Called Lovely

episodes.plot: Sheldon uses his new friendship with the school bully to boss Georgie around. Also, Missy steals Meemaw’s makeup for picture day.
episodes.title: David, Goliath and a Yoo-hoo from the Back

episodes.plot: Sheldon and Dr. Sturgis have their first fight when Dr. Sturgis marks a question wrong on Sheldon's test. Also, Mary takes over for Pastor Jeff when he's out sick.
episodes.title: A Math Emergency and Perky Palms

episodes.plot: Things spiral out of control when Sheldon boycotts his favorite bread company. Also, Georgie offers Veronica a shoulder to cry on when she's dumped by her boyfriend.
episodes.title: A Loaf of Bread and a Grand Old Flag

episodes.plot: Inspired by his hero, Albert Einstein, Sheldon tries his hand at the violin. Also, Mary and Meemaw secretly buy a pregnancy test when Mary thinks she's pregnant
episodes.title: Albert Einstein and the Story of Another Mary

episodes.plot: Sheldon moves in with Dr. Sturgis for the weekend to see what his life will be like in college. Also, a lonely Mary tries to bond with the other Coopers during Sheldon's absence.
episodes.title: A Perfect Score and a Bunsen Burner Marshmallow

episodes.plot: Unhappy that school funds are going towards football rather than academics, Sheldon decides to run for class president.
episodes.title: A Political Campaign and a Candy Land Cheater

episodes.plot: Georgie is thrilled when Veronica stays at the Coopers' house for a few days. Also, Meemaw and Dr. Sturgis celebrate their one-year anniversary.
episodes.title: A Proposal and a Popsicle Stick Cross

episodes.plot: The Coopers help Pastor Jeff through a rough patch in his marriage. Also, Sheldon pressures church members for donations when Mary takes him to work for a day.
episodes.title: A Broken Heart and a Crock Monster

episodes.plot: Sheldon invites the entire school to a party for the Nobel Prize announcements. Also, Meemaw learns more about Dr. Sturgis' past, and Georgie's desire for cable TV leads to a standoff between him and George Sr.
episodes.title: A Swedish Science Thing and the Equation for Toast

episodes.plot: After Dr. Sturgis experiences a nervous breakdown, Mary worries Sheldon is headed down a similar path. Also, Georgie discovers he has a knack for sales.
episodes.title: Quirky Eggheads and Texas Snow Globes

episodes.plot: Without Dr. Sturgis’ university class, Sheldon must find a new way to stay academically challenged. Also, Mary helps Pastor Jeff avoid temptation with his girlfriend.
episodes.title: A Broom Closet and Satan's Monopoly Board

episodes.plot: Sheldon takes matters into his own hands when Meemaw refuses to drive him to a lecture with Dr. Linkletter. Also, Georgie tries to impress Veronica with his new business venture
episodes.title: An Entrepreneurialist and a Swat on the Bottom

episodes.plot: Sheldon is forced to take a break from science when his new obsession with "The Lord of the Rings" leads to an unhealthy habit. Also, Missy asks George Sr. to teach her how to play catch.
episodes.title: Hobbitses, Physicses and a Ball with Zip

episodes.plot: After being released from the mental hospital, Dr. Sturgis unexpectedly breaks up with Meemaw.
episodes.title: A Pineapple and the Bosom of Male Friendship

episodes.plot: A church carnival leads Missy to try out for the baseball team. Also, Meemaw struggles after her breakup with Dr. Sturgis.
episodes.title: A Parasol and a Hell of an Arm

episodes.plot: Sheldon starts an internet flame war, and Missy stands up to the boys on her baseball team. Also, Meemaw is unhappy when George Sr. spends time with her new boyfriend.
episodes.title: Pongo Pygmaeus and a Culture that Encourages Spitting

episodes.plot: The University makes George Sr. a lucrative job offer in the hopes of recruiting Sheldon. Also, Georgie gets a job working for Meemaw's new boyfriend, and Mary is determined to rid her home of greed.
episodes.title: The Sin of Greed and a Chimichanga from Chi-chi's

episodes.plot: Mary gets Pastor Jeff involved when Sheldon isn't invited to Billy's birthday party. Also, George Sr. has "male-bonding time" with Dr. Sturgis.
episodes.title: A Party Invitation, Football Grapes And An Earth Chicken

episodes.plot: Sheldon fakes being sick to avoid a swim test at school. Also, Dr. Sturgis spies on Meemaw's new boyfriend.
episodes.title: Teenager Soup And A Little Ball Of Fib

episodes.plot: George Sr. and Meemaw struggle to manage the Cooper household while Mary plans Pastor Jeff’s wedding.
episodes.title: A Live Chicken, a Fried Chicken and Holy Matrimony

episodes.plot: Sheldon learns to listen when an emotional Paige struggles with her parents’ divorce. George Sr. is furious when Georgie tries to buy his way out of chores.
episodes.title: Body Glitter and a Mall Safety Kit

episodes.plot: George Sr. and Georgie go camping with Meemaw's new boyfriend, Dale, but things get complicated when her ex-boyfriend, Dr. Sturgis, tags along. Also, Sheldon and Missy invent a super-game.
episodes.title: Contracts, Rules and a Little Bit of Pig Brains

episodes.plot: Sheldon and Georgie mine for platinum in roadside gravel. Mary is concerned when Missy misuses religion to help with a batting slump.
episodes.title: A Slump, a Cross and Roadside Gravel

episodes.plot: Meemaw meets Dale’s ex-wife, June. Sheldon is forced to work on a group project with reluctant college students.
episodes.title: A Boyfriend's Ex-Wife and a Good Luck Head Rub

episodes.plot: Sheldon visits CalTech for the very first time. Also, Georgie is furious when Mary listens in on a phone call with his girlfriend, and Meemaw tries to cheer up a jealous Missy.
episodes.title: Pasadena

episodes.plot: Dr. Sturgis is furious when Sheldon accuses him of plagiarism. Also, Mary sets out to find a “girl trophy” for Missy’s end-of-season baseball ceremony, and Georgie has an awkward run-in with Veronica while on a date with his new girlfriend, Jana.
episodes.title: An Academic Crime and a More Romantic Taco Bell

episodes.plot: When George Sr. accidentally lands the school librarian in the hospital, the Cooper family must nurse her back to health. Meemaw gives Georgie relationship advice.
episodes.title: A Couple Bruised Ribs and a Cereal Box Ghost Detector

episodes.plot: When Sheldon learns the house next door is for sale, he takes it upon himself to find the perfect neighbors. Missy is torn when she’s forced to pitch against her boyfriend at the baseball game.
episodes.title: A House for Sale and Serious Woman Stuff

episodes.plot: Sheldon has a scientific breakthrough at the dentist's office. Also, Dale (Craig T. Nelson) and Meemaw go to the casino, and Georgie makes a big mistake when Dale leaves him in charge of the store
episodes.title: A Baby Tooth and the Egyptian God of Knowledge

episodes.plot: Sheldon discovers that Mary's been keeping a secret about his future. Also, Meemaw is furious when she learns Dale fired Georgie.
episodes.title: A Secret Letter and a Lowly Disc of Processed Meat

episodes.plot: After graduating high school, Sheldon has a breakdown when he realizes he may not be ready for college. Dale tries to make amends with Meemaw.
episodes.title: Graduation

episodes.plot: Sheldon gets a summer job at the local train museum. Also, George and Missy bond when Missy embarks on a new stage of womanhood, and Georgie discovers Mary's guilty pleasure.
episodes.title: A Docent, A Little Lady and a Bouncer Named Dalton

episodes.plot: With college in sight, Sheldon is determined to ride his bike without training wheels. Also, Mary and George Sr. argue over parenting styles.
episodes.title: Training Wheels and an Unleashed Chicken

episodes.plot: When their mothers force them to attend Vacation Bible School. Also, George is furious after Georgie makes a questionable purchase.
episodes.title: Bible Camp and a Chariot of Love

episodes.plot: Dale and Meemaw work out relationship issues while playing Dungeons and Dragons with Sheldon and Missy. Also, Mary and George take a trip with Coach Wilkins and his wife, and Georgie freaks out when his girlfriend thinks she's pregnant.
episodes.title: A Musty Crypt and a Stick to Pee On

episodes.plot: College orientation does not go as Sheldon planned. Also, Mary is invited to a party when she's mistaken for a university student, and George Sr. helps Pastor Jeff set up a children's nursery.
episodes.title: Freshman Orientation And The Inventor Of The Zipper
